item.description:
Do you feel other people's feelings?
You could be an emotional empath...

Do you understand what people think and why?
Then you could be an intellectual empath...

When you are around people who are ill, do you begin to get sick also?
You could be an physical empath....

Can you read people's minds, and not know how you do it?
YOU COULD BE AN EMPATH!

They say that only 5% of people are empaths, I think the number is much higher....
Empathy is a little known spiritual gift, that can feel like a curse, but can really
be used for higher purposes.

If you are an empath, or think you might be, come join us for a lively discussion about empathy,
learn what it is, the different types, how to deal with it,
and participate in a collaborative research effort-

Coffee, tea, cocoa, and yummy desserts are also available at the coffee shop-
See you there! :)
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the coffee shop on the right side of the store :)
item.name: Calling All Empaths! Evening Talk
